name: ClawTalk Gateway
description: Exposes provider, rate-limit, and voice endpoints for ClawTalk clients

llmCallTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in ms for streaming LLM calls (default: 300000)

jobTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in ms for job scheduler LLM calls (default: 120000)

providers.label: Provider Billing Config
providers.help: Per-provider billing mode. Keys are provider IDs (e.g. anthropic, deepseek). Example: {"anthropic":{"billing":"api"},"openai":{"billing":"subscription","plan":"pro"}}

voice.label: Voice Config
voice.help: STT/TTS configuration. Defaults to OpenAI Whisper + TTS if OPENAI_API_KEY is set. Example: {"stt":{"provider":"openai","model":"gpt-4o-mini-transcribe"},"tts":{"provider":"openai","model":"gpt-4o-mini-tts","defaultVoice":"alloy"}}

pairPassword.label: Pairing Password
pairPassword.help: Password required by clients when pairing to this gateway. If unset, /api/pair is disabled. Example: "my-shared-secret"

externalUrl.label: External URL
externalUrl.help: Preferred client URL returned during pairing. Use this when clients should connect through a fixed URL. Example: "https://my-gateway.example.com"

name.label: Gateway Name
name.help: Friendly name shown to clients during pairing. Example: "Family Gateway"

realtimeVoice.label: Realtime Voice Config
realtimeVoice.help: Default provider and per-provider model/voice settings for real-time streaming. Example: {"defaultProvider":"openai","openai":{"model":"gpt-4o-realtime-preview","voice":"alloy"}}

dataDir.label: Data Directory
dataDir.help: Where talks, context, and reports are stored. Default: ~/.openclaw/plugins/clawtalk

llmCallTimeoutMs.label: Chat Timeout (ms)
llmCallTimeoutMs.help: Streaming chat timeout in milliseconds. Increase if large prompts/tools run long. Example: 300000 (5 min)

jobTimeoutMs.label: Automation Timeout (ms)
jobTimeoutMs.help: Automation/job timeout in milliseconds. Example: 120000 (2 min). Increase for heavier scheduled tasks.
